attributes.title: HORRIBLE🤢
attributes.review: this is the worst app i’ve ever downloaded. when i opened it i saw something that i can’t unsee. his ugly face. this is not okay. all this app does is promote racism. it screams racism, rapist, xenophobia, and transphobic. it doesnt deserve to be on the app store it is absolutely the worst app i’ve ever downloaded.

attributes.title: If he takes down Tiktok-
attributes.review: I definitely used this app and definitely have experienced something bad with the app first hand. I totally didn’t come her from Tiktok. Totally didn’t. At all. Why would you say that??

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: This app is insanely slow moving, hard to navigate, and honestly resembles actual hatred towards others. I did not like this app in the least and it should be taken off the App Store immediately.

attributes.title: it’s awful
attributes.review: this app doesn’t even deserve a star. why should i vote for an oompa loopa cheeto. it also wants we to give IT my number so trump can go and ask me on a date. hell no i don’t date fruit sorry. sorry but it’s a no from me orangy.

attributes.title: Awful president, even more awful app
attributes.review: Regardless of my political affiliation I chose to download this app as a source of information on Trump’s proposed policies and ideologies. Didn’t like the app. Wasn’t efficient and crashed frequently. Don’t waste your time.

attributes.title: AWFUL
attributes.review: this app was so unhelpful and it nothing worked with it. i couldn’t see most of the notifications and it’s just overall a terrible app. i wouldn’t have expected more though😪

attributes.title: Don’t download this app
attributes.review: I was on this app and all of a sudden I got a notification that my phone has a virus and then smoke started coming out of my phone and then I went to the hospital because I inhaled the smoke and now I’m mentally unstable.

THIS APP TOOK OVER 2 MONTHS TO DOWNLOAD. While it was downloading it wasted all my battery Percentage, data, and storage space. Once it finally downloaded it didn’t even work and probably gave my phone a virus. This app is not safe for anyone’s phone!🤢🤢🤢

attributes.title: 💕if I could leave a half star I would💕
attributes.review: This is TRASH! I saw a orange when I opened the app and I’m 💫allergic💫 this app literally and I hope it get taken down because there is no use for this app and hopefully no one will need it soon ✨thanks oompa loopa✨

attributes.title: Bad
attributes.review: I literally started downloading before he was even prezident 😵 once it downloaded finaly it sent out a wave ov electricity that made my whole town go dark for three years, people turned into backwards savages and started killing protesters 😑
